name: gitlab-CVE-2023-7028-unverified-email-16-1
description: An issue has been discovered in GitLab CE/EE affecting all versions from 16.1.0 to 16.1.6 in which user account password reset emails could be delivered to an unverified email address.

queries.name: query0
queries.query: FIND gitlab_account AS account WHERE account._version = '16.1.0' OR account._version = '16.1.1' OR account._version = '16.1.2' OR account._version = '16.1.3' OR account._version = '16.1.4' OR account._version = '16.1.5' OR account._version = '16.1.6'
